Document.TEXT: Featured Company Global Fiber Optics Sensors Market 2016-2020 - Leading Vendors are Banner Engineering, ifm Efector, OMRON & Sick PR Newswire Tuesday, January 19th 2016 DUBLIN , Jan. 19, 2016 /PRNewswire/ -- Research and Markets ( http://www.researchandmarkets.com/research/4wpdlb/global_fiber ) has announced the addition of the Global Fiber Optics Sensors Market 2016-2020 report to their offering. The report predicts the global fiber optic sensors market to grow steadily at a CAGR of about 9% during the forecast period. The fiber optic sensors capability of a higher tolerance for high temperatures is expected to drive the demand for these sensors in applications that has extreme environmental conditions and where electrical sensors fail to function properly, such as the oil and gas, and manufacturing sector. Increased exploration of unconventional resources is another major factor expected to increase the revenues of the fiber optic sensors market during the forecast period. Fiber optic sensors are integrated into equipment used during the drilling and exploration stages. The increase in consumption of oil and gas and the decline in the production of conventional oil reserves has forced vendors and governments to indulge in exploration and drilling activities, therefore, leading to greater demand for fiber optic sensors in this industry. The Americas accounted for almost 42% of the market share during 2015 and is expected to grow at a CAGR of close to 10% during the forecast period.
